markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Vision of Foresight](/Feats.aspx?ID=3875) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 206</row>

**Archetype** [Sleepwalker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=195)

**Prerequisites**
[Sleepwalker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3873)

**Requirements**
You're in a Daydream Trance

</column>

---

You use your daydreams to predict the success of actions, rapidly envisioning the possibilities. Once before the end of your next turn, you can call upon these predictions before you roll a saving throw or skill check. You can roll the saving throw or skill check twice and take the better result.
name: Vision of Foresight

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 6" pfs="Restricted" > Vision of Foresight Single Action Source Dark Archive pg. 206 Archetype Sleepwalker Prerequisites Sleepwalker Dedication Requirements You're in a Daydream Trance --- You use your daydreams to predict the success of actions, rapidly envisioning the possibilities. Once before the end of your next turn, you can call upon these predictions before you roll a saving throw or skill check. You can roll the saving throw or skill check twice and take the better result.
